about_the_game:
Description

Welcome to the mysterious and haunted island of “Keeper’s Curse.” Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure as Casey Trench, a scuba diver who finds himself stranded on the island’s eerie shores. In this action-packed survival third-person shooter, you’ll face relentless waves of cursed creatures while unraveling the secrets of the island and striving to escape its sinister grasp.

Key Features

  • Engaging Gameplay: Survive against hordes of cursed creatures as you scavenge for resources and navigate through treacherous terrain.
  • Dynamic Environments: Explore a beautifully crafted island shrouded in fog and mystery, filled with hidden dangers and secrets waiting to be uncovered.
  • Strategic Resource Management: Gather resources to build bridges in order to power generators, and unlock new areas of the island, all while fending off relentless foes.
  • Compelling Narrative: Unravel the tragic backstory of the island and its former keeper, Bo Barnacle, whose spirit haunts its shores, driving the cursed inhabitants to attack any intruders.
  • Toon Visuals: Experience a unique and captivating art style that brings the island and its inhabitants to life in a way that is both charming and terrifying.

Story

Once a thriving community, the island fell under the curse of its keeper, Bo Barnacle, whose obsession with the island’s newfound inhabitants led to his demise. Now, Casey Trench must navigate through Bo’s twisted legacy, facing his nightmares brought to life, and unlock the secrets that will lead to his salvation.

Will you brave the Keeper’s Curse and escape the island, or become another victim of its haunted shores? The choice is yours in “Keeper’s Curse.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
